,17-beta hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase 3 deficiency
How many people are affected by 17-beta hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase 3 deficiency ?,"17-beta hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase 3 deficiency is a rare disorder. Researchers have estimated that this condition occurs in approximately 1 in 147,000 newborns. It is more common in the Arab population of Gaza, where it affects 1 in 200 to 300 people.",GHR,17-beta hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase 3 deficiency
